attributes.action: Lord Seb Coe to Light the Olympic Flame LONDON 2012
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to inform the organising committee of the 2012 games that we would be delighted and proud to see Lord Seb Coe either light the Olympic flame or be the first to enter the stadium carrying the flame. Lord Coe clearly qualifies for this high honour for his work in the bid and his sporting achievements.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
